== SpainTeam/Members ==

==== Members ====

 This page contains the current list of members of the SpainTeam.

==== Joining ====

 Becoming a member is easy. You only need to do the following steps:
*** Create your own personal page in the wiki and describe there what you can do to help.
*** Sign up in our website and fill the "additional info" including the link to your wiki page.
*** Subscribe our mailing list to be in touch and know what we are doing.

==== Help!!! I don't understand ====

 No problems. If you need a hand with any of this just ask for help. If you really don't understand, ie can't work that out, just ask one of the previous members.

==== Members list ====

 This is an old and out of date list, to see an updated one look at our website.

 
* Active members are the people who participates and does something. Only another active member can modify this value. Ask GatoLoko or Ant30 for more info.
